I am trying to use opencv-4.0.1-android-sdk.zip in latest Android studio. For Armv8 everything is ok. Armv7 crashes when I am trying to call compute function. Maybe I need any special arguments in build.gradle file with Armv7 build? I tried NDK 19, 18, 17, 16, and "-DANDROID_STL=c++_shared" flags, it does not helps.
